text: is a Japanese pop singer-songwriter and actress. She is nicknamed the "Eternal idol" by the Japanese media for her popularity in the 1980s and her long career. She is the mother of Sayaka Kanda. == Discography == === Albums === * 1980: Squall * 1980: North Wind * 1981: 風立ちぬ (Kaze Tachinu) * 1981: Silhouette * 1982: Pineapple * 1982: Candy * 1983: ユートピア
